thread.title: DAY TRIPPIN' - Get sizzlin' at Baconfest
thread.title_full: DAY TRIPPIN' - Get sizzlin' at Baconfest

author: LAKE SUN STAFF
title: DAY TRIPPIN' - Get sizzlin' at Baconfest
text: Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 10:00 AM By LAKE SUN STAFF Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 10:00 AM SPRINGFIELD This tasting event gives ticketholders access to bacon-infused wonderland where the Ozark's best chefs prepare amazing creative bacon snacks. National brands, artisan bacon-makers, and bacon purveyors display, sample and sell a multitude of bacon and bacon-inspired products. The best mixologists and brewers hand out bacon-inspired cocktails, beer and wine. And in honoring bacon in all it's glory, Ozarks Bacon Fest will be holding a Bacon Eating Contest, and participating restaurants will be competing for cash and prizes in a Bacon Inspired Food Challenge. A $30 admission ticket gives you samples of bacon and bacon-infused and inspired foods, local and regional beers, wines and spirits. Shop local and regional companies that offer items. For the real bacon lover, a $45 VIP Bacon Fest Pass gives you entry into the event one hour before the doors open to the public, and an Ozarks Bacon Fest goodie bag stuffed with assorted treats to enjoy and discounts on Bacon Fest shirts and gear. Tickets are limited and the event is expected to sell out. A full restaurant, beer and spirits list is announced at www.ozarksbaconfest.com . For more information, call 417-862-1010. By LAKE SUN STAFF
